title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Its smooth, white surface is almost undetectable and it never peals, chips, or cracks.” [From the instruction booklet with Snopake® correction fluid. Submitted by Andrew F. Downey, Atlanta, Georgia.]
